## OnElementAddedOptions type

An optional configuration object for `onElementAdded`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type OnElementAddedOptions = {
    context?: Document | DocumentFragment | Element;
    selectors?: string;
    signal?: AbortSignal;
};
```
